common.description: This is a multilingual site using Next.js

animation.startDescription: Experience how LaLiga is progressively censoring the internet in Spain. Click to begin the journey.
animation.title: Internet Censorship
animation.subtitle: LaLiga is censoring the internet in Spain
animation.dnsErrorMessage: This website has been blocked by LaLiga
animation.accessDenied: Access denied by order of LaLiga
storyMessages: The internet was free and open
People could access any website they wanted
And they managed to get away with censoring it
animation.clickWebsite: Click on a website to continue
